F

failIfNotAllDestinationMembersMapped() - Method in class org.beancp.convention.NameBasedMappingConvention
Convention will fail during map building (see NameBasedMappingConvention.build(org.beancp.Mapper, java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class) method) if not all destination properties are mapped.
failIfNotAllSourceMembersMapped() - Method in class org.beancp.convention.NameBasedMappingConvention
Convention will fail during map building (see NameBasedMappingConvention.build(org.beancp.Mapper, java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class) method) if not all source properties are mapped.

G

getFlexibleMatch() - Static method in class org.beancp.convention.NameBasedMappingConvention
Returns mapping convention with following configuration: No destination members excluded Maximum possible number of destination members included Will not fail if not all destination members are mapped Will not fail if not all source members are mapped Flattening feature enabled Will cast or map if possible for members of different data type (see NameBasedMappingConvention.castOrMapIfPossible() method)
getStrictMatch() - Static method in class org.beancp.convention.NameBasedMappingConvention
Returns mapping convention with following configuration No destination members excluded Maximum possible number of destination members included Will not fail if not all destination members are mapped Will not fail if not all source members are mapped Flattening feature disabled Will not cast or map if possible for members of different data type (see NameBasedMappingConvention.castOrMapIfPossible() method)
